actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the increase of the Federal share of certain projects under section 203 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

summary.text: Provides that the Federal share of any sewerage treatment projects approved by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency between January 24, 1975 and June 30, 1975 shall be 100 percent of the construction cost.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the increase of the Federal share of certain projects under section 203 of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
